episodes.title: The Michael J. Rinder Aftermath Foundation: Updates & News
episodes.description:
This is a fundraiser to support The Michael J. Rinder Aftermath Foundation program. We will provide live updates and news on our programs and efforts to help those leaving Scientology start new lives.

Website: https://www.theaftermathfoundation.org
General Donations: https://theaftermathfoundation.networkforgood.com/projects/205488-general-donation-page
Billboard Donations: https://theaftermathfoundation.networkforgood.com/projects/217517-billboard-campaign
Volunteer: https://www.theaftermathfoundation.org/volunteer
Newsletter: https://www.theaftermathfoundation.org/newsletter
Billboard Video: https://youtu.be/bC7MfyKOS5Y?si=9RU6A2AzoFx6GNkF

episodes.title: Our 2025 Billboard Campaign
episodes.description: Hear from one of our board members about our 2025 billboard campaign and see footage of billboards currently up in Los Angeles, CA.

episodes.title: Why do we use the word "escape"? #shorts
Leaving Scientology with Claire Headley
episodes.description:
In the third and final video of our series, Leaving Scientology, board president Claire Headley discusses her escape from Scientology and the extreme control that Sea Org members face.

Learn more about our work at theaftermathfoundation.org

Thank you for watching!

episodes.title: The Sea Org is a highly controlled environment #shorts
The Aftermath Foundation and the CFC
episodes.description:
CFC is the Combined Federal Campaign, the most rigorously screened workplace giving program for all current and retired Federal employees. Participation also affords us the opportunity to make presentations to multiple Federal agencies on the work The Aftermath Foundation does. 

For example, last year we did presentations to Veteran’s Affairs, Department of Homeland Security, FAA, Department of Defense and other agencies. 

We are excited to announce that we were approved for a second year of participation with the CFC!

#acceptance #community #help #support #survivors #theaftermathfoundation #cfc #combinedfederalcampaign #approved #givingprogram

episodes.title: Feeling unprepared for living outside of Scientology #shorts
Communication is restricted in the Sea Org #shorts
Leaving Scientology with Rachael Hastings
episodes.description:
This is the second video in our mini series, "Leaving Scientology".

The Aftermath Foundation exists to help people leave Scientology and start new lives. Many of those we help prefer to stay anonymous, given the litigious and disruptive nature of Scientology and its practices of Fair Game. It can be very challenging to start a new life after Scientology. We are tremendously grateful for the opportunities our work affords us to help people start over. We've put together several videos to document recent successes. Please share and help us spread the word on this important work. 

If you'd like to support our efforts, please visit: www.theaftermathfoundation.org. 

Thanks for watching! #scientology #aftermath #cults #cultsurvivors #freedom

episodes.title: The Story of Serge Obolensky: An Aftermath Foundation Documentary
episodes.description:
www.theAftermathFoundation.org

The Aftermath Foundation was established to help those who want to leave Scientology and the Sea Organization, but who lack a system of support they can rely on while getting on their feet in the outside world.

Serge was raised in scientology from a very young age and joined the Sea Organization at age 11, committing to a billion years of service to scientology. Serge's parents and his brothers were also part of the Sea Organization. After several years of hard labor, no education, no family support and a rigorous schedule, Serge's life was in ruins. At age 19, while he was living on L Ron Hubbard Way, Serge had a fireworks accident in which he lost both of his hands and one of his eyes. Thereafter he was promptly cut off from his family and all mental and emotional support, as a result of which Serge was homeless on Hollywood Blvd for 10 years.

The Aftermath Foundation presents: The Story of Serge Obolensky.

#scientology #aftermathfoundation

episodes.title: The Aftermath Foundation: An Introduction
episodes.description:
Welcome to The Aftermath Foundation!
Our purpose is to help those who want to leave Scientology and/or the Sea Organization, but who lack a system of support that they can rely on while getting on their feet in the outside world.
Our board of volunteers is dedicated to providing resources, support, education, and advocacy for those who have been adversely affected by scientology practices and raising public awareness on this organization.
Learn more here: www.theaftermathfoundation.org
